name: 2021 6th International Conference on Big Data and Computing（ICBDC 2021）
content: Publication： Accepted papers will be included into ICBDC 2021 conference proceedings. The Proceedings will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8980-8), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
